EmailTemplate.name: 2018- EMEAI HON Ops Conf Istanbul.201803_EMEAI_istanbul ops conf Invite_Irina
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to join the Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE- Istanbul Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2018 Honeywell Operators Conference! Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: April 24, 2018
Location: Sheraton Istanbul Atakoy Hotel <[[https://sheratonistanbulatakoy.com.tr/]]>, Sahilyolu Cad, Atakoy, 34158, Istanbul
Agenda:
13:30 - 14:00
Welcome coffee and snacks
14:00 - 14:30
Sponsors' introduction
14:30 - 15:00
<[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/prgak-boscolo-prague-autograph-collection/]]> Customer and support organization presentation, Global Customer Committee overview and update
15:00 - 15:15
Honeywell GoDirect™ – bringing the highest quality of connectivity to you
15:15 - 15:30
Honeywell Technology: Jetwave, MCS series & CNX-900 Hardware
15:30 - 16:00
Break
16:00 - 16:30
Inmarsat Technology: SwiftBroadband & JetConnex
16:30 - 17:00
Protect yourself against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)
17:00 - 17:30
Honeywell Technology: Mandate Coverage & Upgrades
17:30 - 17:45
ATS update
17:45 – 18:00
Q & A
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018-EMEAIHONOpsConfIstanbul.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you in Istanbul!
Jiri Huml Customer Support Manager
